snippet.title: 3D Driving-School
snippet.description: A video of me driving around in 3D Driving-School (3D-Fahrschule). I wasn't using a steering wheel whilst recording this - just the keyboard. It is pretty simple and basic to use. It's also very handy if you are learning how to drive as it will give you an idea what it's like driving, stopping at traffic lights, using the indicators and whatnot. The rules here on this video are not the UK rules. I selected Germany on it as I haven't completed all the other tests. I chose this one because it's a bit longer and more enjoyable. This, of course is only for entertainment purposes only and no copyright infringement is intended. All rights reserved.
